action.text: SA 1932 (the instructions of the motion to refer) fell when cloture invoked on the motion to concur in the House amendment to the Senate amendment to H.R. 1892 with an amendment (SA 1930).
Considered by Senate (Message from the House considered).
Considered by Senate (Message from the House considered).
Amendment SA 1932 proposed by Senator McConnell. (consideration: CR S700) To change the enactment date.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1932 proposed by Senator McConnell.
